analysis.description:
WithdrawContract.doPayment (/unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#489-503) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! _dest.send(_amount) (/unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#494-499)

WithdrawContract.canWithdraw (/unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#444-461) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nextDepositToPayout[_holder] == deposits.length

WithdrawContract.canWithdraw (/unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#444-461) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nextDepositToPayout[_holder] == deposits.length
WithdrawContract.doPayment (/unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#489-503) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- address(_token) == 0

Escapable.escapeHatch (/unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#179-194) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(escapeHatchDestination,balance) (/unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#193)

WithdrawContract.withdraw has external calls inside a loop:
	- acc += d.amount * rewardToken.balanceOfAt(msg.sender,d.block) / rewardToken.totalSupplyAt(d.block) (/unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#397-401)

WithdrawContract.getPendingReward has external calls inside a loop:
	- acc += d.amount * rewardToken.balanceOfAt(_holder,d.block) / rewardToken.totalSupplyAt(d.block) (/unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#438-440)

WithdrawContract.canWithdraw has external calls inside a loop:
	- amount = d.amount * rewardToken.balanceOfAt(_holder,d.block) / rewardToken.totalSupplyAt(d.block) (/unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#458-460)

Reentrancy in WithdrawContract.newTokenDeposit (/unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#333-348):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_token.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_amount)) (/unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#341-344)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- deposits (/unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#344-345)
	- deposits (/unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#346-347)
	- deposits (/unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#346-347)

Different versions of Solidity is used in /unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol:
	- Version used: ['^0.4.15', '^0.4.18']
	- /unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#2-3 declares pragma solidity^0.4.15
	- /unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#38-39 declares pragma solidity^0.4.15
	- /unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#133 declares pragma solidity^0.4.15
	- /unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#211-212 declares pragma solidity^0.4.18

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#375:
	- Usage of "msg.gas" should be replaced with "gasleft()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/14/0x0efef0b34638addc8833ba729ae20016b5f24ffc.sol#376-402:
	- Usage of "msg.gas" should be replaced with "gasleft()"
